revised_title: Advanced Methods of Energy Conversion: A Discussion on Magnetohydrodynamic Power Generation, Air Heaters, and Seed Recovery
tldr: This article discusses advanced methods of energy conversion, specifically focusing on magnetohydrodynamic power generation, air heaters, and seed recovery for m.h.d. plants. The authors explore various air heater designs and their challenges, as well as the potential for more efficient and compact methods of producing heated air. They also discuss the development of pumps for handling liquid slag in these systems.
